vote.title: An ordinance amending Chapter 51A, “Dallas Development Code: Ordinance No. 19455, As Amended,” of the Dallas City Code by amending Sections 51A-9.401 “Application” and 51A-9.403 “Appeals” of “Division 51A-9.400. Four-Way/All-Way Stop Controls at Residential Intersections” to (1) amending the notice requirement for appeals; (2) providing a penalty not to exceed $2,000.00; (3) providing a saving clause; (4) providing a severability clause; and (5) providing an effective date - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
